about_the_game:
SCP: Facility is a mass multiplayer game.
After the facility has a mass failure, the SCP's are set loose, and so are the d-class and facility personnel. Will you make it out alive?


SCP:Facility - Releases 2025 October 21st

short_description: SCP: Facility is a PvP - Strategy online multiplayer game, where you, class-d, scientists, and more, are trapped in an underground containment facility after a containment breach, with the Anomalies loose. Will you be able to escape to safety? there's only one way to find that out.
